channel.title: Ephed up dreams
channel.description:
Okay, so today i dreamed that aliens came the world and they destroyed and killed everyone. They would be done in 2 days. I saw just like everything falling down, the world changed to a white un-livable place. The weird thing also is that when i woke up like 3 am and when i fell asleep again, the dream continuied. Lol.
Well, anyone else had kinda like f'ed up dreams?

item.title: Ephed up dreams
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:25, topic:379475”]This was last night.

I had a dream I was playing minecraft then I was in davidi2’s house. Then I went up stairs and all of a sudden I was flying an aircraft and crashed into the ground.

legit story is legit.[/quote]
I have minecraft dreams as well… In fact, I’m so addicted to the game, I see the real world around me as blocks, even people!

legit story

Read full topic

item.title: Ephed up dreams
item.dc:creator: @Roxee Roxee™
item.description:
@Roxee wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:12, topic:379475”]I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: “We hold these truths to be self-evident: that all men are created equal.”

I have a dream that one day on the red hills of Georgia the sons of former slaves and the sons of former slaveowners will be able to sit down together at a table of brotherhood.

I have a dream that one day even the state of Mississippi, a desert state, sweltering with the heat of injustice and oppression, will be transformed into an oasis of freedom and justice.

I have a dream that my four children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character.

I have a dream today.

I have a dream that one day the state of Alabama, whose governor’s lips are presently dripping with the words of interposition and nullification, will be transformed into a situation where little black boys and black girls will be able to join hands with little white boys and white girls and walk together as sisters and brothers.

I have a dream today.

I have a dream that one day every valley shall be exalted, every hill and mountain shall be made low, the rough places will be made plain, and the crooked places will be made straight, and the glory of the Lord shall be revealed, and all flesh shall see it together.[/quote]

Who wants to be the first one to shoot him?

Read full topic

item.title: Ephed up dreams
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

Uhm, I had a dream a few days ago where I was riding my bike on a lake with a friend while getting chased by a crocodile. We managed to escape it and I ended up in this house where this family was getting threanted by their father with a gun, and somehow, I ended up with a gun. The father pointed the gun at me and I calmly told him to put the gun down and he starts crying, pulls the trigger and it doesn’t fire. I end up tackling him and arresting him.

I thought that was pretty weird…

Read full topic

item.title: Ephed up dreams
item.dc:creator: @flj0yter0p flj0yter0p
item.description:
@flj0yter0p wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:18, topic:379475”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=475317.msg3476065#msg3476065 date=1295717880]
My dream was about my bus driver driving to a hotel with all the kids inside but I’m pro so I called in a napalm strike and dclawed her

Yes most of my dreams involve RuneScape and COD, sometimes Minecraft lelel

Anyway the weirdest dream I had:

I woke up in a car, then some gang members were shooting me, then I teleported to their hut place. Then they said they need me to kill people at the white house. So I teleported to the white house, I saw Bush and Obama sitting next to each other and shook Bush’s hand but not Obama’s so was like “uhumm” then I shook his hand and started shaking other peoples hands. Then all of a sudden I turned into a RuneScape character with red dragonhide and a rune crossbow, and then I was getting ice barraged like crazy but they kept splatting. Some1 finally got me then I took out an ags and hit a 43 and owned them. Then I saw those gang people again with a red package which I knew was poison somehow lol. They were chasing me, then all of a sudden some1 napalm striked the place, then there were attack dogs. So I started ranging the attack dogs and the gang people joined in and they had blood blitz. Then I got teleported to my house, but it was my really old house back when I was very little like 2 and I lived in Staten Island. And then I told her you were going to die and she said it’s ok, then I teleported back to the gang place, then they tried to kill me by hitting me over the head with a wrench but the guy accidently hit himself with it so I kicked him in the nuts and teleported. Then I saw a friend there and he started going crazy and started pooping and eating it (don’t ask me lol) and then these weirdo flying squids came in and inked everywhere. Then I woke up.

Lol
[/quote]

wut

The weirdest dream I had was that I was fucking this girl that I knew would fuck me, and then I woke up and I had jizz in my pants :o[/quote]This happened to me too once, but shit felt so real in the dream… like i could feel touching her and stuff. Wope up, jizz in my pants and ofcourse, sad.

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:9, topic:379475”]I’m not gay, homo or anything else and this is one fucked up dream I had last night.

I dreamt that I was fingering my mate in school (he had a pussy) then it bent over and I banged it. Then I was picking up trees that looked heavy but weighed heavy and light. And some other wierd stuff.[/quote]Roflmao.

Read full topic

Yes most of my dreams involve RuneScape and COD, sometimes Minecraft lelel

Anyway the weirdest dream I had:

I woke up in a car, then some gang members were shooting me, then I teleported to their hut place. Then they said they need me to kill people at the white house. So I teleported to the white house, I saw Bush and Obama sitting next to each other and shook Bush’s hand but not Obama’s so was like “uhumm” then I shook his hand and started shaking other peoples hands. Then all of a sudden I turned into a RuneScape character with red dragonhide and a rune crossbow, and then I was getting ice barraged like crazy but they kept splatting. Some1 finally got me then I took out an ags and hit a 43 and owned them. Then I saw those gang people again with a red package which I knew was poison somehow lol. Lol[/quote]

Or…
I have a dream… A song to sing
To help me cope… With anything
If you see the wonders… Of a fairytale
You can take the future… even if you fail

I BELIIEEVEEEE IN ANGELS!!!
something good in everything I see
I BELIIEEVEEEE IN ANGELS!!!
When I know the time is right for me
I’ll cross the stream… I have a dream

Anyway, I was having a dream about how we we’re first in a normal world (Sister, Me, and Ex), and that I was some kind of secret agent, so I had on the suit on and stuff. Then I started to love Ex again, so we started to hang out a lot. Then it started to get a little sexual but then something started to happen, we had like a war happening at our house like the Marines, and some other people. Then I was surprised from my sister’s appearance that I shot her in the heart.[/quote]
